A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a die hard Star Wars fan who loves the original 3 and TFA\, I can't believe how often I thought during the movie how rediculous of a movie this was. So many plot holes\, so many cliche scenes (Luke's The Matrix fight scene\, Leah flying through space with the force?)\, so many childish jokes\, so many meaningless merchandise characters. So disappointing.
